column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There are so many tapas to choose from
column2: but our favorites include the dates wrapped in bacon
column4: and the buttermilk fried chicken thighs with peri-peri sauce. The chicken paella is fantastic as well
column5: it is definitely worth trying at least once! We prefer to get a bunch of tapas
column6: but whatever suits you!The white peach sangria is also heavenly!
